skillTree.name: Daemon of Tzeentch
skillTree.description: Powerful winds of magic constantly surround this daemon, greatly diminishing the effectiveness of magical attacks.

effects.description: Magic resistance: 15%

Cooldown: -25% to "Soul Leech of Tzeentch"
	(Lord's army)

Cooldown: -25% to "Unholy Pact with the Changer"
	(Lord's army)

Range: +100% for Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Aura of Chaos
skillTree.description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.description: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

skillTree.name: Smoke & Mirrors
skillTree.description: A conjured shadow is just as obfuscating as a real one - the Shadow Wizard is master or mistress of the 'concealing' arts.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Smoke & Mirrors"

skillTree.description: When cast this spell enfeebles enemy minds; they feel the crushing weight of reality bearing down upon them.

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -10%

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

skillTree.name: Great Time Negation
skillTree.description: Only the greatest of wizards can cheat time and regenerate their magic will for all spells at once.

effects.description: Cooldown: -15% to all spells

skillTree.name: Dominating Presence
skillTree.description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description: Character's aura leadership effect: +5

skillTree.name: Chaos Vanguard
skillTree.description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

skillTree.description: Khorne’s will imbues his creatures with a vicious, unslakeable hunger for battle.

skillTree.name: Blessed by Chaos
skillTree.description: Unnatural strength, an aura of dark menace, an unwavering devotion to the Chaos Gods – some warriors have undoubtedly been touched by the Ruinous Ones.

skillTree.description: Breaking bones and ending lives, the armies of Chaos strike like an unholy hammer crashing through their enemies' ranks.

skillTree.description: Hulks of pure muscle, held upright by unsullied hatred, can crush a man with a frightening lack of effort.

skillTree.name: Legion of Doom
skillTree.description: The legions march forth under the Lord's inscrutable gaze, eager to kill for fear of his wrath.

skillTree.name: Speed & Malice
skillTree.description: The worthiest of Chaos' vanguard are blessed with the most elaborate mutations, which also enable them to run faster for longer.

skillTree.description: Mutations awarded by the Chaos Gods to their followers may look horrific to southerners, but such gifts are prized.

skillTree.name: Guided by Tzeentch
skillTree.description: Impossible foresight is granted to a few among the ranks of the Ruinous armies, allowing them to land the critical blow upon their foes.

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +10%

skillTree.name: Despoilers
skillTree.description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.
